content: can we release this package with HAPI? I think you said you were going to?

Yup for sure. Planning on getting this into the next release.. I've been stuck on our current one for longer than I wanted to be, we've had a bunch of unexpected bugs reported and I'm frantically trying to get it out since it's the 1.6.0 connectathon release. But this week is release week for sure- bugs all fixed so as soon as that's done i'll have a look at the converter stuff.
great. We've got 2 converters now - a general purpose DSTU2 -> Current interconverter, and a 2016May converter that we are using for Conformance resources

Does that also do the terminology mappings too?
(I might port this to .NET once STU3 is published and formal)
I think so, though it depends on what you mean
I'll check when the time comes for me to do it.
